word:
Many recognized the fact that the whole community had been transformed since we went there. A woman who was not a believer, but who had almost accepted the truth before some churchman filled her mind with prejudice against our views, said to me, "You would not believe me if I could inform you fully in regard to the 


                   -241- 

transformation that has taken place in this community as the result of your moving here, establishing a school, and holding these little meetings."
